Conversations/Bank/Hayden/Museum Lines/d: I saw that $Deep Earthworm$ at the museum. I've got admiration for any creature that works the soil.
Conversations/Bank/Hayden/Museum Lines/s: I was trying to figure the breed, but it's awfully hard to concentrate when I'm looking at that round little face. Can't get enough of it!
That =Stone Horse= in the museum's collection is so cute, [Ari].
